summary: In World War II, during the Japanese invasion of Burma, the lost remnant of a British Army Brigade HQ, led by the ruthless Captain Alan Langford, escapes through the jungle toward the British lines.
cast: Stanley Baker|Guy Rolfe|Leo McKern|Gordon Jackson|David Oxley|Richard Pasco|Philip Ahn|Bryan Forbes|Wolfe Morris|David Lodge|Percy Herbert|Russell Waters|Barry Lowe|Burt Kwouk|Timothy Bateson|Geoffrey Bayldon|Brandon Brady|Edwina Carroll|Donald Churchill|Alan Keith|Arthur Lovegrove|Barry Steele|Howard Williams|Vincent Wong
title: Ayer enemigos
